FuncDef: This command enabled RIB prioritization for the IS-IS protocol and specifies the prefix list or IS-IS tag value that will be used to select the specific routes that should be processed through the IS-IS route calculation process at a higher priority.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the prefix list which is used to select the routes that are processed at a higher priority through the route calculation process.
Specifies the tag value that is used to match IS-IS routes that are to be processed at a higher priority through the route calculation process. Values-1 to 4294967295.
